data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Pomorskie, Poland to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pomorskie, Poland
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Pomorskie, Poland.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 322 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 2,230,100 people living in the state of Pomorskie.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Pomorskie, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Jew, Polish-speaking people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Jew, Polish-speaking people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Jew, Polish-speaking people is yours.
Lord, the believers in the state of Pomorskie, Poland need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Pomorskie, Poland not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, move the 6,920 believers in the state of Pomorskie to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."
